Thanks for picking up. I missed that.

On Jul 10, 2008, at 6:38 PM, Brian Smith wrote:

> A cache is not allowed to do that: "A cache cannot assume that an  
> entity
> with a Content-Location different from the URI used to retrieve it  
> can be
> used to respond to later requests on that Content-Location URI." -
> http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc2616#section-14.14
